headline: GTA Online
subtitle: This Week on the Lucky Wheel Podium: The Peyote Gasser
content: Swing by the lobby of The Diamond Casino & Resort any time over the next seven days and give the Lucky Wheel a spin. In addition to all sorts of other prizes including GTA$, this week you can walk away with the keys to a Peyote Gasser, a beefed-up muscle car from a bygone era, one that handles like an aging action star clinging to relevance with a dangerous experimental supplement program.
